issue.title: No shadows and sun light with non-Nvidia GPUs

message.raw:
There is no sunlight and shadows when using a non-Nvidia GPU.

Gazebo versions 7.x–9.x are affected. Encountered this issue on every machine with Intel or AMD GPU.

See:

[http://answers.gazebosim.org/question/21130/no-shadows-or-lights-in-gazebo/](http://answers.gazebosim.org/question/21130/no-shadows-or-lights-in-gazebo)

[http://answers.gazebosim.org/question/22442/gazebo-environment-suddenly-dark/](http://answers.gazebosim.org/question/22442/gazebo-environment-suddenly-dark)

[http://answers.gazebosim.org/question/20561/floor-and-texture-changed-black/](http://answers.gazebosim.org/question/20561/floor-and-texture-changed-black)
